title: User Interaction Sound Effects Pack
description: Elevate your games with our modern collection of professionally designed, high-quality user interface sounds.
longDescription:
Listen to the audio preview > HERE

Check out the video preview > HERE


User Interaction is a collection of 700 modern UI sounds organized into 12 categories suitable for usage in an infographic, game, animation, or user interface environment.


Our aim with this carefully crafted collection is to give you a time-saving toolset ready to drag and drop in your projects. This wide array of modern sounds will help you stand out with your sound design.


What's Ιnside

  • 095 Confirm Sounds
  • 078 Deny Sounds
  • 107 Select Sounds
  • 037 Hover Sounds
  • 024 Progress Loop Sounds
  • 080 Scan Loop Sounds
  • 016 Text Loop Sounds
  • 080 Whoosh Sounds
  • 090 Window Sounds
  • 037 Pop up Sounds
  • 014 Warning Loop Sounds
  • 042 Impact Sweetener Sounds


Thick, Middle, Thin User Interface Sounds

User Interaction features different sound sizes/priorities to meaningfully set apart sounds within the same category. This level of distinction enables you to have more flexibility and make faster choices when it comes to layering sounds. This feature is particularly useful for those who require precise control over their sound design and want to achieve the desired sound effect with ease.


Creative Freedom

All our sounds have been meticulously created to be 100% dry, without any application of reverb. Our ultimate goal is to empower you with the complete freedom and endless possibilities to craft your own distinctive masterpieces, without any limitations or boundaries. We aim to enable you to unleash your creativity and imagination to the fullest extent. Our dry sounds serve as a canvas for you to give life to your vision.


Drag-and-Drop Ready

Our extensive collection of high-quality sounds has been pre-mixed and mastered with the utmost attention to detail, ensuring that they meet industry-leading quality. This means that you can easily incorporate them into your project without the need for any further edits. With a simple drag and drop, you can effortlessly integrate these sounds into your production, saving you time and effort while maintaining the desired level of excellence.


UCS Compliant and detailed Metadata embedded

User Interaction is fully universal category system (UCS) compliant. Additionally, to optimize your workflow and enhance productivity, our audio files are equipped with detailed metadata, allowing you to locate and access the sounds you require easily. Leading audio management software such as Soundminer and BaseHead are fully equipped to read and process the metadata, providing an intuitive and seamless user experience.

technicalDetails:
Number of sound effects: 700 royalty-free sounds in total.

Audio file types: wav

Sample rate: 44.1 kHz

Bit depth: 16-bit

Loopable: Some Yes

Additional: Stereo format

Total Minutes of Audio: 34 minutes 55 seconds

Target Platform: All

Important/Additional Notes: No
